name: iter8-cli
description: CLI Tool for Iter8 customers - Get personalized feedback and apply code changes

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && esbuild dist/cli.js --bundle --platform=node --define:process.env.SUPABASE_ANON_KEY='"`printf %q "$SUPABASE_ANON_KEY"`"' --define:process.env.OPENAI_API_KEY='"`printf %q "$OPENAI_API_KEY"`"' --outfile=dist/bundle.js
scripts.pkg:macos: ITER8_PRODUCTION=true npm run build && pkg dist/bundle.js --targets node18-macos-x64 --output iter8-cli-macos
scripts.pkg:linux: ITER8_PRODUCTION=true npm run build && pkg dist/bundle.js --targets node18-linux-x64 --output iter8-cli-linux
scripts.pkg:win: ITER8_PRODUCTION=true npm run build && pkg dist/bundle.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output iter8-cli-win.exe
scripts.pkg:all: npm run pkg:macos && npm run pkg:linux && npm run pkg:win

author: Iterate-8
